timeline.bodyText: @jkwatson Any reason to use addAll before? Couldn't think of one so made this symmetrical with above
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: But this does not set as in "replace current value", it actually adds given attributes to already existing ones. No?
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: last-in wins, so this will replace current values. setAll is a better name. 👍
replies.author: jkwatson
